document_data.name: Rildara Danthree
document_data.mainbody: '''Rildara Danthree''' was a [[half-elven]] [[adventurer]] of the late 9{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{yearlink|886}}, she was known to have owned ''[[Adriyana's Garter]]''. Rildara later attempted to climb aboard a ''[[skyship]]'' sailing above the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]. As the vessel moved past [[Arrabar]], she slid off and fell to her apparent death in the sea.
